product.title: Hot Tools Pro Signature One-Step Paddle Hair Dryer and Styler, Purple
product.description: Introducing the One-Step Detachable Straight Dryâ„¢ Paddle Dryer. The new, paddle brush head is designed with all the one-step features you love and more to help you dry, straighten, and refresh your hair the way it deserves. Sometimes you just want a classic, sleek look. This hair dryer gives you one-step performance and professional reliability to create all the straight style perfection youâ€™ve been looking for. The new paddle brush head is large, allowing you to dry and smooth hair quickly. The lightweight, detachable design (simple to operate with the Easy Release Button) is great for gorgeous hair on-the-go, for staying organized at home, or both. Easily portable and just as easy to store! Boartechâ„¢ flexible, detangling bristles easily work through hair, gently detangling to help reduce breakage, while also providing better grip on strands for the perfect smooth and straight styles. Pro Tip: Change up your style. Use the Ribbed Design on the back of the paddle brush to curl ends under or flip out. Variable Temperature Control provides a variety of drying and styling options, and most importantly, great results for all hair types. Designed with ION® Technology to fight frizz and help reduce damage. Whether youâ€™re doing a full style or just touching up, faster drying equals less heat. And speaking of touch-ups, Refresh³â„¢ Activated Charcoal helps revive hair. The perfect solution for routine styling and second-day revamps. A five-year limited warranty guarantees dependable performance and consistent results.

product.description_full:
Introducing the One-Step Detachable Straight Dryâ„¢ Paddle Dryer. The new, paddle brush head is designed with all the one-step features you love and more to help you dry, straighten, and refresh your hair the way it deserves. Sometimes you just want a classic, sleek look. This hair dryer gives you one-step performance and professional reliability to create all the straight style perfection youâ€™ve been looking for. The new paddle brush head is large, allowing you to dry and smooth hair quickly. The lightweight, detachable design (simple to operate with the Easy Release Button) is great for gorgeous hair on-the-go, for staying organized at home, or both. Easily portable and just as easy to store! Boartechâ„¢ flexible, detangling bristles easily work through hair, gently detangling to help reduce breakage, while also providing better grip on strands for the perfect smooth and straight styles. Pro Tip: Change up your style. Use the Ribbed Design on the back of the paddle brush to curl ends under or flip out. Variable Temperature Control provides a variety of drying and styling options, and most importantly, great results for all hair types. Designed with ION® Technology to fight frizz and help reduce damage. Whether youâ€™re doing a full style or just touching up, faster drying equals less heat. And speaking of touch-ups, Refresh³â„¢ Activated Charcoal helps revive hair. The perfect solution for routine styling and second-day revamps. A five-year limited warranty guarantees dependable performance and consistent results. * STYLE AND DRY IN ONE STEP: Dries and smooths hair quickly in up to half the time
 * STYLING FLEXIBILITY: 3 Heat/Speed Settings with Cool option and 6ft swivel cord for tangle free styling
 * CARE FOR YOUR VOLUMIZER: Clean air inlet regularly, remove hair from the brush after every use and do not wrap cord around the unit. To keep bristles in best condition let unit cool before storing
 * LARGE PADDLE DESIGN: Designed with boar-tech bristles with silk glide effortlessly detangle tresses while you dry for a sleek finish.
 * 2ND DAY STYLING: Refresh Activated Charcoal barrel and bristles to keep your feeling fresh
 * DETACHABLE DESIGN: Detachable head makes this the perfect travel hair dryer. Easily store whether you're on the go or simply keeping organized at home.
product.description_full_html:
Introducing the One-Step Detachable Straight Dryâ„¢ Paddle Dryer. The new, paddle brush head is designed with all the one-step features you love and more to help you dry, straighten, and refresh your hair the way it deserves. Sometimes you just want a classic, sleek look. This hair dryer gives you one-step performance and professional reliability to create all the straight style perfection youâ€™ve been looking for. The new paddle brush head is large, allowing you to dry and smooth hair quickly. The lightweight, detachable design (simple to operate with the Easy Release Button) is great for gorgeous hair on-the-go, for staying organized at home, or both. Easily portable and just as easy to store! Boartechâ„¢ flexible, detangling bristles easily work through hair, gently detangling to help reduce breakage, while also providing better grip on strands for the perfect smooth and straight styles. Pro Tip: Change up your style. Use the Ribbed Design on the back of the paddle brush to curl ends under or flip out. Variable Temperature Control provides a variety of drying and styling options, and most importantly, great results for all hair types. Designed with ION® Technology to fight frizz and help reduce damage. Whether youâ€™re doing a full style or just touching up, faster drying equals less heat. And speaking of touch-ups, Refresh³â„¢ Activated Charcoal helps revive hair. The perfect solution for routine styling and second-day revamps. A five-year limited warranty guarantees dependable performance and consistent results.

  • STYLE AND DRY IN ONE STEP: Dries and smooths hair quickly in up to half the time
  • STYLING FLEXIBILITY: 3 Heat/Speed Settings with Cool option and 6ft swivel cord for tangle free styling
  • CARE FOR YOUR VOLUMIZER: Clean air inlet regularly, remove hair from the brush after every use and do not wrap cord around the unit. To keep bristles in best condition let unit cool before storing
  • LARGE PADDLE DESIGN: Designed with boar-tech bristles with silk glide effortlessly detangle tresses while you dry for a sleek finish.
  • 2ND DAY STYLING: Refresh Activated Charcoal barrel and bristles to keep your feeling fresh
  • DETACHABLE DESIGN: Detachable head makes this the perfect travel hair dryer. Easily store whether you're on the go or simply keeping organized at home.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
